definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Full use of all non-motorised water sports and all associated equipment.
sentences.chinese: 充分利用所有非机动水上运动和所有相关设备。

sentences.english: For example swimming and water polo are disciplines of the sport Aquatics.
sentences.chinese: 比如游泳和水球都是水上运动的分项。

sentences.english: There are loads of water sports on offer at Dadonghai.
sentences.chinese: 大东海的水上运动项目特别多。

sentences.english: Our water sports teams are all good.
sentences.chinese: 我们的水上运动团队都很厉害。

sentences.english: Many gyms offer instructed classes in the water.
sentences.chinese: 很多体育馆开有水上运动的讲授课。

sentences.english: The water sports here attract large numbers of tourists to the islands.
sentences.chinese: 这里的水上运动吸引了大量的游客来这岛游玩。

sentences.english: Water work-outs could just be the work out you need.
sentences.chinese: 水上运动正是你需要的锻炼。

sentences.english: The butterfly is a kind of water sport.
sentences.chinese: 蝶式游泳是一种水上运动。

sentences.english: It is perfect for romance, entertainment and water sports.
sentences.chinese: 这里是完美的蜜月，娱乐和水上运动圣地。

sentences.english: Strong in water sports, she reflects the blue Olymic ring.
sentences.chinese: 她擅长水上运动，代表了奥运五环中的蓝环。

sentences.english: Beibei is a fish. It represents the blue ring and aquatic sports.
sentences.chinese: 贝贝是一条鱼，它代表了蓝环与水上运动。

sentences.english: Visitors can participate in various water sports at Yanqi Lake.
sentences.chinese: 游客在雁栖湖可以进行各类水上运动。

sentences.english: For water sports, scuba-diving and snorkeling courses are available.
sentences.chinese: 其水上运动包括水肺潜水和浮潜课程可供选择。

sentences.english: Swimming and water skiing are both aquatic sports.
sentences.chinese: 游泳和滑水都是两项水上运动。

sentences.english: Water work-outs allow you to exercise without the rough impact on the body.
sentences.chinese: 水上运动不会在锻炼的时候对身体造成剧烈的影响。

sentences.english: Canoeing is a water sport practiced in small boats called canoes or kayaks.
sentences.chinese: 皮划艇是使用皮划子或小艇进行的水上运动。

definition: stand-up paddleboarding (SUP)/stand-up paddleboard/blade of a propeller/blade of an oar
